plot: "King Pawn" is a metaphor for the struggle of the individual in a repressed society. The story follows the growing awareness of one "Pawn" and his inability to exist in his surroundings.
title: King Pawn
plot_es: "King Pawn" is a metaphor for the struggle of the individual in a repressed society. The story follows the growing awareness of one "Pawn" and his inability to exist in his surroundings.
